name: History, I guess
description:
This multiplayer card game is really just a SQL database demo project (yet, it's a completely functional game).
There is no intermediate server, all of the game's functionality is coded in database's stored procedures which are called directly from a deskop client made on Unity.
The game itself is basically Timeline (real life card game): players have to put great inventions and discoveries in (what they think is) a right chronological order.
